verses.text: I love the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, because he hath heard my voice andmy supplications.
Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon himas long as I live.
The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
Then called I upon the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
Gracious isthe \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, and righteous; yea, our God ismerciful.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath dealt bountifully with thee.
For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, andmy feet from falling.
I will walk before the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*in the land of the living.
I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:
I said in my haste, All men areliars.
What shall I render unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*forall his benefits toward me?
I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
I will pay my vows unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*now in the presence of all his people.
Precious in the sight of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*isthe death of his saints.
O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, truly I amthy servant; I amthy servant, andthe son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.
I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
I will pay my vows unto the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*now in the presence of all his people,
In the courts of the \+w LORDâ€™s|strong="H3068"\+w*house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*.
